properties.description: IT Services and IT Consulting company specializing in healthcare technology solutions; 381 employees (+19.9% YoY growth), founded in 2004, headquartered in Saudi Arabia. Focuses on impact, sustainability, and innovation, providing digital hospital solutions, health information systems, and SaaS offerings like Cyclus. Operates primarily in Saudi Arabia with a global web presence of 33,500 monthly visits, ranked #890,607 worldwide.

company.name: Cloud Solutions
company.about:
Cloud Solutions is focused on providing leading-edge technology solutions to healthcare providers through healthcare solutions. This ability to provide convergence solutions effectively positions Cloud Solutions at the top of the value chain in terms of services and solutions provided to the care provider organizations. Where appropriate, Cloud Solutions will seek to implement solutions that are innovative, integrative and supportive to evolving organizations goals, demands and expectations. 

We focus on an integrated approach combining medical equipment, clinical networking, healthcare informatics and managed services to deliver enterprise solutions to clients. Our solutions can be seen as the first step to implement a regional electronic health record (EHR) among all member hospitals.

The company’s business has been built on a formula of providing outstanding service value for customers across the region specialized on Healthcare sector and solutions. Cloud Solutions has established itself as one of the few companies with the complete locally available expertise to carry out large technology projects in the region specialized in Healthcare.

properties.description: HALA is a private financial services company headquartered in Saudi Arabia, with 355 employees and 19.8% YoY growth; $25M annual revenue; $7.1M total funding, last raised via convertible note in 2022. It operates a SaaS-based digital banking platform for SMEs, offering online business accounts, payment processing, expense management, and financing. The company has a strong web presence with 92,900 monthly visits and ranks #339,703 globally.

حساب الأعمال الذي يعطيك تسوية فورية للمبيعات إلى حسابك، مع قبول وإرسال المدفوعات والتحكم في المصروفات والحصول على التمويل لتنمية منشأتك، وكلّ ذلك من منصة واحدة.

# موثوق من قبل الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة

هلا هي الحل البسيط والموثوق لإدارة الشؤون المالية للشركات الصغيرة في المملكة العربية السعودية. من المدفوعات إلى المشتريات والتمويل، نحن نغطي كل شيء.

company.name: HALA
company.about:
Our focus is to empower SMEs to manage, run, and grow their businesses seamlessly with our all-in-one platform.
We're building the future bank of SMEs—where managing finances is not just about transactions but about empowering businesses to achieve their fullest potential. By embracing innovation and fostering strong relationships, we push the boundaries of what’s possible, offering not just financial solutions but a movement for change.
Join us as we continue to support SMEs in their journey toward success and redefine the banking landscape with integrity and creativity.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS (Software as a Service) industry
evaluations.reasoning: The internal profile and the Hala website describe an all‑in‑one digital banking platform that is accessed online and offers subscription pricing (e.g., $9 / month). The site explicitly refers to a “cloud POS system” and the product pages show that users can open a business IBAN, accept payments, manage expenses, and obtain financing through a web‑based interface. These are classic SaaS characteristics: software hosted by the provider, delivered over the internet, and billed on a recurring basis. No evidence indicates that Hala sells on‑premise licenses or purely infrastructure services. Therefore Hala meets the SaaS criterion.

references.title: Working at Hala (Saudi Arabia) - Glassdoor
references.snippet:
What do you know about Hala and why you want to work for Hala?
Amazing Co-Founder Mindset Hala Payments offers a very flexible and supportive working environment, with friendly and collaborative people across all teams. The culture encourages learning, open communication, and work-life balance. It's a great place for those who value teamwork and a positive daily atmosphere.
